personal_information.name: Database Administrator & Academic Support Specialist - Talent Gateway

professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with advanced Excel skills and academic support expertise, seeking analyst opportunities.

work_experience.company: Talent Gateway University of Michigan - Dearborn
key_responsibilities: Maintained and coordinated the use of Symplicity system for database operations.
Provided academic support to Talent Gateway offices and conducted student intake.
Created Excel reports using advanced functions like pivot tables
Updated Excel spreadsheets and forms to reduce data-entry errors.
Prepared reports for key stakeholders and managed relationships with employers.
Provided academic support focusing on leadership and learning styles.
Designed instructional activities and implemented workshops.
Reviewed financial statements and maintained LaserPro data accuracy.
Decreased audit exceptions by implementing detailed procedures.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration (Finance)
